type.description: A writeComplete event reports the result of a write that blocked. A dataRead event reports bytes that have arrived following a read call that blocked.

resultCode.description: The result code, if the event type is writeComplete.

data.description: The data, if the event type is dataRead.

isFinalEvent.description: Whether this is the final event that this socket will send.

srcId.description: An ID unique to the calling function's context so that events can get routed back to the correct callback.

functions.name: create
functions.description: Creates a socket of the specified type.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of socket to create. Must be udp.

onEvent.description: This function is called with events that occur during the lifetime of the socket.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Called when the socket has been created.

socketId.description: The id of the newly created socket.

functions.name: destroy
functions.description: Destroys the socket. Each socket created should be destroyed after use.

functions.name: connect
functions.description: Connects the socket to the given address. In the case of a UDP socket, this method merely associates the address with the socket for future sent data.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Called when the connection is complete.

functions.name: read
functions.description: Reads data from the connected socket.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Delivers data that was available to be read without blocking.

message.description: The data received. Warning: will probably become a blob or other appropriate binary-friendly type.

functions.name: write
functions.description: Writes data on the connected socket.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data to write. Warning: will probably become a blob or other appropriate binary-friendly type.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Called when any of the following happens: the write operation completes, the write operation blocked before completion, or an error occurred.

bytesWritten.description: The number of bytes sent, or a negative error code.

events.name: onEvent
events.description: Used to pass events back to the function that called create().
